description: Number of ways writing n! as a sum of two primes.
comments: Number of unordered pairs of primes (p,q) such that n! = p + q.
formula: In other words, a(n) = A061358(n!) = number of prime+prime partitions of n!.
crossrefs: Cf. A061358, A000142. See A140088 for a variant.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 05 2001
